docs.snippet: The N.C.A.A. reversed course after declaring Steven Rhodes ineligible to play for Middle Tennessee State because of his participation in an organized football league....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. reversed course after declaring Steven Rhodes ineligible to play for Middle Tennessee State because of his participation in an organized football league.
docs.abstract: NCAA restores football eligibility of former Marine Sgt Steven Rhodes amid criticism; originally declared Rhodes ineligible to play for Middle Tennessee State because he participated in organized football during his time with the military.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Restores Marine’s Eligibility to Play Football
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Restores Marine’s Eligibility To Play Football

docs.snippet: With a motive that's both chilling and simple — to break up the boredom of an Oklahoma summer — three teenagers randomly targeted an Australian collegiate baseball player who was attending school in the U.S. and killed him for fun, pro...
docs.lead_paragraph: With a motive that's both chilling and simple — to break up the boredom of an Oklahoma summer — three teenagers randomly targeted an Australian collegiate baseball player who was attending school in the U.S. and killed him for fun, prosecutors said Tuesday as they charged two of the boys with murder.

headline.main: 3 Teens Charged in Death of Australian Player
headline.print_headline: 3 Teens Charged in Death of Australian Player
